string-array.item:
*About the project:* 
This application was developed by students of the University of the West Indies, St. Augustine as their Final year project while pursuing completion of their degrees in the Field of Computer Science. 

The application was built fully using Android Studio and was developed for students to help with organization and time management of assignments.
